Template.name: database.logicunit.sqlTable
Template.Source: CREATE TABLE <jt:item source='$dataset.data_name' format='field'/>_DS ( <jt:loop source='$fields' alias='field'> <jt:item source='$field.data_name' format='field' rpad='20'/> <jt:item source='$field.data_type'/><jt:notEquals source='$field.is_null' value='Y'> NOT NULL</jt:notEquals><jt:position type='last' source='$field' elseValue=','/> </jt:loop> )<jt:equals source='$dataset.config' value='logic'> TABLESPACE EUISCH</jt:equals>; <jt:loop source='$keys' alias='key'> <jt:notEquals source='$key.key_type' value='Foreign'> <jt:equals source='$key.key_type' value='Primary'> ALTER TABLE <jt:item source='$dataset.data_name' format='field'/>_DS ADD CONSTRAINT <jt:empty source='$dataset.data_alias' value='$dataset.data_name' elseValue='$dataset.data_alias' format='Upper'/>_PK PRIMARY KEY ( OUID )<jt:equals source='$dataset.config' value='logic'> USING INDEX TABLESPACE EUISCH</jt:equals>; </jt:equals> <jt:equals source='$key.key_type' value='Unique'> <jt:notEquals source='$key.is_null' value='Y'> ALTER TABLE <jt:item source='$dataset.data_name' format='field'/>_DS ADD CONSTRAINT <jt:empty source='$dataset.data_alias' value='$dataset.data_name' elseValue='$dataset.data_alias' format='Upper'/>_UK_<jt:empty source='$key.data_alias' value='$key.data_name' elseValue='$key.data_alias' format='Upper'/> UNIQUE ( <jt:item source='$key.unique_names' format='field'/> )<jt:equals source='$dataset.config' value='logic'> USING INDEX TABLESPACE EUISCH</jt:equals>; </jt:notEquals> </jt:equals> </jt:notEquals> </jt:loop> <jt:loop source='$indexs' alias='index_name'> <jt:notEmpty source='$index_name.index_name'> CREATE INDEX <jt:item source='$index_name.data_name' format='field'/>_DX_<jt:item source='$index_name.index_name' format='field'/> ON <jt:item source='$dataset.data_name' format='field'/>_DS( <jt:loop source='$index_name' alias='index'> <jt:item source='$index.index_params' format='field'/><jt:position source='$index' type='last' value=')' elseValue=','/> </jt:loop> TABLESPACE EUISDX STORAGE ( INITIAL 64k MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED ); </jt:notEmpty> </jt:loop>
